page.title: 01Introduction Brenchley South
page.content: This{rural area}is situated mainly in the Parish of Brenchley and also in the Parish of Lamberhurst. We have no village centres but cover parts of the villages of Brenchley and Matfield including Matfield Church.The villages of Lamberhurst,Goudhurst and Horsmonden are nearby,Tunbridge Wells is the nearest town. The countryside is gently rolling, with green hills and valleys covered with pastures,woodland,orchards and hopgardens.A few houses and buildings are dotted here and there. {Farming is the main industry}with fruit farming predominating.There are also dairy farms,beef and deer herds and hop growing.Chestnut is coppiced. In Petteridge there are several small businesses including a coal packers, reptile skin dressers and fencing manufacturers.
